bike.description: Specialized FACT 9r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, monocoque construction, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts.
Specialized Campy style, 1-3/8" lower bearing, integrated threadless, stainless steel sealed cartridge bearings, 20mm carbon cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
